title: Sustainable nanocarriers fabricated via a dipeptide-based co-assembly approach for enhancing the delivery and translocation of herbicides
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00696H, Paper
Zirui Zheng, Ziyun Yang, Zehua Meng, Siyang Liu, Tianyue Wu, Chengyi He, Chenhui Zhang, Chen Ma, Yuxia Gao, Fengpei Du
Sustainable herbicide-loaded nanocarriers with pH-responsiveness, good translocation and herbicidal activity were fabricated using a supramolecular assembly approach.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
